title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.5 - Exterior signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.5 - Exterior signs

State Regulations
A wholesale liquor licensee, a wholesale wine licensee
and a winery licensee having the right to sell wine at retail, as hereinbefore
limited, may display a sign on the exterior of the licensed premises stating
that wines are sold at wholesale and retail. All other signs are subject to the
provisions of subdivision 4 of section
104
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
